text: Hi , I am learning hubpost and currently trying to add Custom HubL to template but I am not able to find this module in Market Place
so anyone knows ,how can I add Custom HubL to my template file. I am able to download Custom HTML module from marketplace
can I use that module for custom HubL
I tried but it is not working
you can't have HubL in the Custom HTML module, I would just use a custom module - <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/cos-general/create-and-edit-modules>
I solved it yesterday by creating custom module
